T02D1453:367b-1: sapta aaksha ra s'a dha na /
T02D1453:367b-3: yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1453:367b-4: rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1453:367b-6: bdag ngos dran pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1453:367b-7: blo dang ldan pa legs gyur pa //
T02D1453:367b-8: he ru ka dpal la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1453:367b-9: 'di bsgom pa la dbang bar gyur pa'i sngags pas tho rangs mal nas langs te /
T02D1453:367b-10: snying gar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h'um nag po bltas la /
T02D1453:367b-11: de'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid dri ma med par byas nas /
T02D1453:367b-12: de'i lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
T02D1453:367b-13: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag dang mtshon
T02D1453:367b-14: char ldan pa 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha'i phyogs
T02D1453:367b-15: su bltas te / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod la /
T02D1453:367b-16: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1453:367b-17: bdag gi sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D1453:367b-18: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D1453:367b-19: dang so so'i skye bo ma lus pa'i bsod nams
T02D1453:367b-20: la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1453:367b-21: bdag 'di nas byang chub kyi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1453:367b-22: theg pa chen po'i tshogs kyi chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1453:368a-0: phyir mi ldogs pa'i byang chub @368a * //
T02D1453:368a-1: dpa'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1453:368a-2: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1453:368a-3: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
T02D1453:368a-4: bar ji srid du de rnams la mchog tu mthar
T02D1453:368a-5: thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1453:368a-6: byang chub la dgod pa'i slad du sangs rgyas dang
T02D1453:368a-7: byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa la bdag gi
T02D1453:368a-9: dge ba 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa'i
T02D1453:368a-10: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes byas
T02D1453:368a-11: la yi ge brgya pa brjod pas bcom ldan 'das
T02D1453:368a-13: aom shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya /
T02D1453:368a-14: ma nu p'a la ya he ru ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D1453:368a-15: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1453:368a-16: aa nu ra kto me bha ba /
T02D1453:368a-17: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1453:368a-19: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1453:368a-20: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'an /
T02D1453:368a-21: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i
T02D1453:368a-22: bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a:
T02D1453:368a-23: badzra mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1453:368a-24: de nas sems can thams cad las lha'i bde ba nye bar sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i byams pa dang /
T02D1453:368a-25: sdug bsngal thams cad se la bar byed pa'i rnam pa'i snying rje dang /
T02D1453:368a-26: lha'i bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par nges pa'i rnam pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1453:368a-27: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen
T02D1453:368a-28: po'i lam nye bar sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i btang snyoms
T02D1453:368a-29: bsgom par bya'o // de'i rjes la chos thams cad
T02D1453:368a-30: yid kyis dmigs te sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta
T02D1453:368a-32: ston ka'i nyi ma gung gi nam mkha' dri ma
T02D1453:368a-33: med pa'i dkyil lta bur chos thams cad mngon du
T02D1453:368a-34: byas te / aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra
T02D1453:368a-35: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1453:368a-37: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las bdag nyid 'chad
T02D1453:368a-38: par 'gyur ba'i dpal he ru ka'i gzugs sku mdog
T02D1453:368a-39: dang mtshon char ldan pa mngon par sprul la /
T02D1453:368a-40: snying ga'i sa bon gyi lcags kyus phyogs bcu na
T02D1453:368a-41: gnas pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug ste khron par chud
T02D1453:368a-42: par byas la / khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad kyi phur bus gdab bo //
T02D1453:368b-0: lha mo de rnams sku @368b mdog dmar po 'bar ba gsal zhing /
T02D1453:368b-1: phyag gnyis pa mgo skyes dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1453:368b-2: gri gug dang thod pa dang /
T02D1453:368b-3: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1453:368b-4: smad rtse mo'i rnam par byas pa /
T02D1453:368b-5: mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1453:368b-6: sngags pas khro bo'i mig gis sngags bzlas shing bgegs rnams khron par chud par byas te /
T02D1453:368b-7: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-8: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-9: aom gri hn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-10: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an bidy'a r'a dza h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-11: shar la sogs par g-yon nas rnam par bskor zhing /
T02D1453:368b-12: me la sogs par g-yas nas bskor te dgod do //
T02D1453:368b-13: de nas aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'ana h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-14: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-16: badzra k'i la badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti
T02D1453:368b-17: sarba dusht'an k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra k'i la ya
T02D1453:368b-18: h'um h'um phat / 'dis spyi bor brtan por bzhag par bya'o //
T02D1453:368b-19: aom badzra mudga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-20: 'dis rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o //
T02D1453:368b-21: de nas phur pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi dang /
T02D1453:368b-22: logs su rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D1453:368b-23: steng du rdo rje gur dang /
T02D1453:368b-26: phyi rol du rdo rje me 'bar ba bsgoms la sngags kyis kyang brtan par bya ste /
T02D1453:368b-27: aom me di ni badzri bha wa badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1453:368b-28: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1453:368b-29: aom badzra wi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1453:368b-30: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram /
T02D1453:368b-31: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um ram h'um phat /
T02D1453:368b-32: sa'i cha bgegs med par bltas la /
T02D1453:368b-34: a'a li k'a li yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1453:368b-35: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du h'um las byung
T02D1453:368b-36: ba'i rdo rje lte bar h'um yig de nyid can
T02D1453:368b-37: bltas te / de'i 'od zer gyi sprin spros pas
T02D1453:368b-38: 'gro ba rnams dpa' bo'i rang bzhin du bsams la
T02D1453:368b-39: bltas te / / de nyid bsdus pas yud tsam
T02D1453:368b-40: gyis sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba'i sna tshogs padma
T02D1453:368b-41: dang nyi ma'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'i
T02D1453:368b-42: dbus su 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan yang dag par
T02D1453:368b-43: mnan pa'i dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D1453:368b-44: char sprin sngon po lta bu la //
T02D1453:368b-45: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02D1453:368b-46: g-yon brkyang pa yi gom pas gnas //
T02D1453:368b-47: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1453:368b-48: zla ba phyed pas thod du byas //
T02D1453:369a-2: brgya phyed mog bos rnam par brgyan //
T02D1453:369a-3: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1453:369a-4: phag mo la ni 'khyud par brtson //
T02D1453:369a-5: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga //
T02D1453:369a-6: g-yas pa'i phyag na rtse gsum pa //
T02D1453:369a-7: gnyis kyis mi yi pags pa'i gos //
T02D1453:369a-8: mnga' bdag phyag rgya drug gis brgyan //
T02D1453:369a-9: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po che //
T02D1453:369a-10: g-yas pa ser po lta bu la //
T02D1453:369a-11: g-yon pa ljang gu 'jigs pa che //
T02D1453:369a-12: mi yi rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1453:369a-13: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing //
T02D1453:369a-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D1453:369a-15: phag mo mgon po lta bu ste //
T02D1453:369a-16: 'on kyang mi yi pags pa spangs //
T02D1453:369a-17: lha mo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing //
T02D1453:369a-18: lhan cig skyes dga'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1453:369a-19: de nas 'khor lo rtsibs drug la //
T02D1453:369a-20: shar la sogs par g-yon rim bzhin //
T02D1453:369a-21: dang po lha mo he la ki //
T02D1453:369a-22: gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma //
T02D1453:369a-23: gsum pa drag cing gtum pa mo //
T02D1453:369a-24: bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma ste //
T02D1453:369a-25: lnga pa rdo rje drag mo yin //
T02D1453:369a-26: drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1453:369a-27: sngon mo ser mo dmar mo dang //
T02D1453:369a-28: ljang dang dur mdog dkar rim bzhin //
T02D1453:369a-29: lha mo 'di rnams cher drag cing //
T02D1453:369a-30: phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma //
T02D1453:369a-31: kun kyang yi dags nyi ma'i gdan //
T02D1453:369a-32: phyag bzhi dang ni spyan gsum ma //
T02D1453:369a-33: mi yi pags pa rtag 'dzin cing //
T02D1453:369a-34: dril bu cang te'u legs par bsnams //
T02D1453:369a-35: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1453:369a-36: g-yon brkyang ba yi gom pas gnas //
T02D1453:369a-37: kun kyang phyag rgya lngar 'chang zhing //
T02D1453:369a-38: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1453:369a-39: yi ge bdun las yang dag byung //
T02D1453:369a-40: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma //
T02D1453:369a-41: de ltar yongs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor grub par bltas te /
T02D1453:369a-42: snying ga'i sa bon gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug la /
T02D1453:369a-45: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D1453:369a-46: bcing ba dang dbang du byas te /
T02D1453:369a-47: dam tshig dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu rnam par bsams la /
T02D1453:369a-48: snying ga'i sa bon gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te /
T02D1453:369a-49: yid kyis mchod pas mngon par mchod la /
T02D1453:369a-50: dbang bskur ba'i don du tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1453:369a-51: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1453:369b-0: ji ltar @369b mchod chen stsal ba ltar //
T02D1453:369b-1: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1453:369b-2: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1453:369b-3: de ltar gsol ba btab pa'i de ma thag tu
T02D1453:369b-4: sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i gzugs 'dzin pas
T02D1453:369b-5: rang gi stobs kyis byung ba'i dbang bskur ba'i rdzas
T02D1453:369b-6: rnams kyis / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1453:369b-7: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1453:369b-8: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D1453:369b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1453:369b-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1453:369b-12: sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes brjod cing dbang
T02D1453:369b-13: bskur te / dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i spyi bor mi bskyod pa bskyed /
T02D1453:369b-14: khrag 'thung ma la sogs pa'i rim pa ji lta
T02D1453:369b-15: ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab
T02D1453:369b-16: par bsam mo // de nas go cha shes par bya ste /
T02D1453:369b-17: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1453:369b-18: de'i rjes la snying gar rdo rje'i steng du ha dkar po bsams te /
T02D1453:369b-19: aom ha badzra satva h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-20: spyi bor zla ba la 'khor lo'i steng du hi ser po bltas la /
T02D1453:369b-21: na ma hi bee ro tsan h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-22: spyi gtsug tu nyi ma la padma'i steng du hu dmar po bltas la /
T02D1453:369b-23: sv'a h'a hu padma na rte shva ra h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-24: phrag pa gnyis su nyi ma la rdo rje'i steng du he sngon po bltas te /
T02D1453:369b-25: boo sha ta he shr'i he ru ka h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-26: mig tu nyi mar rin po che'i steng du ho ser po bltas la /
T02D1453:369b-27: h'um h'um ho badzra s'urya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-28: dpral bar sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge
T02D1453:369b-29: ham lja gu bltas te phat ham pa ra ma
T02D1453:369b-30: aa shva badzra h'um h'um phat ces bya ba 'di
T02D1453:369b-31: ni go cha drug gi sngags so //
T02D1453:369b-32: gzhan yang phag mo'i go cha'i sngags ni /
T02D1453:369b-33: de'i rdo rje'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bam dmar po bsams la /
T02D1453:369b-34: aom bam badzra b'a r'a h'i h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-35: snying gar zla ba la yom sngon po bltas te /
T02D1453:369b-36: ham yom ya me n'i h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-37: lcer padma la hrim dkar po bsams la hrim mom mo ha ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-38: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du hrem ljang
T02D1453:369b-39: gu bltas la aom hrem hrim san ts'a la ni
T02D1453:369b-40: h'um h'um phat / spyi gtsug tu rin po che'i steng du h'um nam mkha'i mdog can bltas te /
T02D1453:369b-41: h'um h'um tr'a sam ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-42: dpral bar sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du yi ge phat du ba'i mdog can bltas la /
T02D1453:369b-43: phat phat tsandi ka h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:369b-44: de'i rjes la spyi bor padma dkar po la zla ba la aom /
T02D1453:370a-1: po chos kyi 'byung gnas la a'a:/
T02D1453:370a-2: snying gar sna tshogs padma la nyi mar h'um bsams te /
T02D1453:370a-3: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1453:370a-4: dkyil 'khor pa'i sna lha mo thams cad kyang lus
T02D1453:370a-5: dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs te yang yi
T02D1453:370a-6: ge brgya pa brjod pas brtan par bya'o //
T02D1453:370a-7: rig sngags bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pas bzlas pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1453:370a-8: snying gar padma'i nyi mar rtsibs drug pa'i 'khor lo la /
T02D1453:370a-9: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge bdun dkod [?] do /
T02D1453:370a-10: yid kyis brjod pa lta bu'i sngags bzla'o //
T02D1453:370a-11: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1453:370a-12: ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bzlas te /
T02D1453:370a-13: skyo bar gyur na yi ge brgya pa brjod la /
T02D1453:370a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snying ga'i sa bon la chud par byas nas langs te /
T02D1453:370a-15: lha'i rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D1453:370a-16: gung dang dgongs mo'i thun la lha'i khyim du zhugs te /
T02D1453:370a-17: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1453:370a-18: las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros te gnas ji
T02D1453:370a-20: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1453:370a-21: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02D1453:370a-22: sgom pa'i thog ma dang tha mar ni gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1453:370a-23: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te yam dang
T02D1453:370a-24: ram yongs su gyur pa las rlung dang me'i dkyil
T02D1453:370a-25: 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a'a: las skyes pa'i
T02D1453:370a-26: thod pa'o // de'i dbus su aom yi ges mtshon pa'i rdzas rnams so //
T02D1453:370a-27: de'i steng du h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1453:370a-28: de nas rdo rje padma mnyam par sbyor ba las me 'bar te des de rnams spros pa dang /
T02D1453:370a-29: btsos pa dang zhu bar gyur te ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar por gyur pa dang /
T02D1453:370a-30: de'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu rnams kyis sangs rgyas
T02D1453:370a-31: thams cad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi bdud rtsi
T02D1453:370a-32: bkug ste de nyid du bcug nas /
T02D1453:370a-33: aom a'a: h'um zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1453:370a-34: aom sarba badzra d'a ki n'i bha kshi me sho dha ya gu hyam badzri ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1453:370a-35: zhes pas lan gsum gyi bar du bsngags la /
T02D1453:370a-36: nam mkha'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bltas te /
T02D1453:370a-37: mdzub mos mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
T02D1453:370a-38: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab sbyar nas //
T02D1453:370a-39: de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag ste //
T02D1453:370b-0: bskor zhing bskor bas kun du bskor bar @370b bya //
T02D1453:370b-1: rkang pa mnan cing gyen du blta //
T02D1453:370b-2: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1453:370b-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1453:370b-4: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / de nas tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya ste //
T02D1453:370b-5: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02D1453:370b-6: de gsungs tshig kyang tshad ma mchog yin pa'i //
T02D1453:370b-7: bden pa 'dis ni lha mo 'di dag rnams //
T02D1453:370b-8: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
T02D1453:370b-9: de'i rjes la rdo rje thal mo kha gyen la
T02D1453:370b-10: phye nas spyi bor legs par gzhag la /
T02D1453:370b-11: aom a'a: a'a ra lli ho dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D1453:370b-12: badzra d'a ki n+ya sa ma ya stvam dri shya
T02D1453:370b-13: ho:/ zhes lan gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga ru brjod la /
T02D1453:370b-14: gtso po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la dbul lo //
T02D1453:370b-15: de'i rjes la mchod pa byas la /
T02D1453:370b-16: yang tshigs su bcad pa brjod de /
T02D1453:370b-17: srid dang zhi bar gyur nas chags pa'i kun rtog rlabs bcom zhing //
T02D1453:370b-18: de nyid du na dngos po ma lus mkha' bzhin du gzigs pa //
T02D1453:370b-19: ches lci thugs rje'i chu yis thugs kyi padma rgyas pa'i mgon //
T02D1453:370b-20: lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu thugs brtser mdzod cig mdzod //
T02D1453:370b-21: ces bya ba 'dis bstod la gtor ma'i lhag ma
T02D1453:370b-22: mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la 'dis sbyin par bya'o
T02D1453:370b-23: // aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarbba yaksha
T02D1453:370b-24: r'aksha sa bh'u ta preta pi sh'a tsa aun ma
T02D1453:370b-25: da aa pa sm'a ra gra ha d'a ki n+ya
T02D1453:370b-26: // da ya / ai mam pa lim gri hnantu /
T02D1453:370b-27: sa ma ya rakshantu ma ma sarba siddhi mme pra
T02D1453:370b-28: yatstshantu ya thee bam ya theshtam bhunydza tha pi ba
T02D1453:370b-29: tha m'a me aa ti kra ma tham ma sarbba
T02D1453:370b-30: k'ar ta ya satshu kha bi briddha ye sa ha
T02D1453:370b-31: yi k'a bha bantu aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1453:370b-32: / yi ge brgya pa mu:'i mtha' can bton pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1453:370b-33: zas kyi dus su sngar bzhin bza' ba thams cad sbyangs te /
T02D1453:370b-34: lte ba'i padma'i ze'u 'brur mthe bong gi tshad kyi me rnam par bsams la /
T02D1453:370b-35: srog dang rtsol ba bsdams pas me bar tu spar te yid kyi mchod pas mchod la /
T02D1453:370b-36: de nyid du 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur par bltas nas /
T02D1453:370b-37: 'bar ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das thugs ka'i sa
T02D1453:370b-38: bon las bskyed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1453:370b-39: dang lhan cig tu byas nas /
T02D1453:370b-40: ljags h'um las rdo rjer byung bar bsams te /
T02D1453:370b-41: bdud rtsi des sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1453:370b-42: nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1453:371a-1: rang gi reg pa yud tsam gyis phag mo'i gzugs
T02D1453:371a-2: su bltas la sgrub thabs la sogs pa nas gsungs
T02D1453:371a-3: pa'i chogs ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D1453:371a-6: lus ngag byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas bdag kyang
T02D1453:371a-7: de bzhin du he ru ka'i rnam par byas te
T02D1453:371a-8: / yi ge ae las lha mo'i padma 'dab ma gsum pa dang yi ge a'a: las ze'i 'bru'o //
T02D1453:371a-9: h'um las skyas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1453:371a-10: yi ge aom las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1453:371a-11: de'i bu gar ni phat de /
T02D1453:371a-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1453:371a-13: ya mi zhes pa'i sngags dran zhing bskyod pas rab
T02D1453:371a-14: tu dga' ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1453:371a-15: bkug ste / kha'i lam nas snying gar zhugs nas /
T02D1453:371a-16: bde ba chen po zhu bar gyur nas rdo rje'i lam nas padmar dbab ba //
T02D1453:371a-17: de nas bdud rtsi de nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod par bya'o //
T02D1453:371a-18: nang gi mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1453:371a-19: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems brtan par 'dod pas /
T02D1453:371a-20: a'a li k'a li sngon bsams nas //
T02D1453:371a-21: rnal 'byor chen po ngal bso ste //
T02D1453:371a-22: lte ba'i dbus su rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1453:371a-23: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1453:371a-24: yi ge'i gnas kyi mchog gyur pa //
T02D1453:371a-25: de yi dbus su gnas pa bsam //
T02D1453:371a-26: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1453:371a-27: lha yi gzugs kyi bsgom par bya //
T02D1453:371a-28: de ni gzugs las 'das pa ste //
T02D1453:371a-29: sems nyid du ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1453:371a-30: bsam gyis mi khyab de yang bsam //
T02D1453:371a-31: sems nyid du nam brtag mi bya //
T02D1453:371a-32: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na //
T02D1453:371a-33: de las gzugs ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1453:371a-34: mnyam med yon tan gter gyur sngom pa'i yi ge bdun pa 'di'i //
T02D1453:371a-35: sgrub thabs 'bad par byas las bsod nams thob pa des //
T02D1453:371a-36: 'jig rten ma lus pa ni dpa' bo'i dbang po ltar //
T02D1453:371a-37: 'gro rnams gcig gyur mthar thug rab tu gnas gyur
T02D1453:371a-38: cig / yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs pandi ta
T02D1453:371a-39: chen po nag po pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa
T02D1453:371a-41: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1453:371a-42: klog skya shes rab ba rtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1453:371a-43: slad nas bod kyi lo ts'a ba a'a ts'arya mar
T02D1453:371a-44: pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhus te gtan la
